# Mixed Images

This README includes both HTML `<img>` tags and Markdown image syntax.

<div>
  <img src="https://example.com/assets/html-image.png" alt="HTML image" />
</div>

Here is a Markdown image right below:

![Markdown Image](https://example.com/assets/markdown-image.png)

And one more HTML image for good measure:

<img src="https://example.com/assets/another-html-image.png" alt="Another HTML image" />
